# [Interview #843: Charleston City Paper (Cover Story), Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=843#16)

#### M. L. Van Valkenburgh

A day in his life is no carefree walk in the park. Anyone who thinks writing a book is easy is misled.
